name: matte
description: Mattebibliotek i WASM, skrive med AssemblyScript. Inkluderar Matrise, Vektor3, Vektor4, Proj

scripts.asbuild:optimized: asc assembly/index.ts --runtime stub --disable mutable-globals --disable sign-extension --target release
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
scripts.build: npm run asbuild:optimized && cp ./build/optimized.wasm ../../wasmModules/matte.wasm && wasm-strip ../../wasmModules/matte.wasm && wasm-opt -Os ../../wasmModules/matte.wasm -o ../../wasmModules/matte.wasm

author: Eskil Gjerde Sviggum
